Web Ontology Language
OWL semantics
In order to define the qualities that the individuals of a class 
must hold to be members of that class, restrictions on the 
number and type of binary relations are used
Thus, the restrictions define the conditions that must be 
fulfilled to be a member of a given class
speaker: SYSTEM
